data.title: Snow meets with Afghan Finance Minister Dr. Ashraf Ghani
data.meta_description: (Archived Content) Treasury Secretary John Snow meets with Afghan Finance Minister Dr. Ashraf Ghani to discuss the progress of economic reconstruction in Afghanistan. All media queries should be directed to The Press Office at (202) 622-2960. Only call this number if you are a member of the media. High Resolution Image
data.text:
Treasury Secretary John Snow meets with Afghan Finance Minister Dr. Ashraf Ghani to discuss the progress of economic reconstruction in Afghanistan.

All media queries should be directed to

The Press Office at (202) 622-2960.

Only call this number if you are a member of the media.
